name: Save The Pork!
description:
ruKa is a teenage pig who has always suffered from depression and episodes   due to their low self-esteem.

One afternoon when it was raining heavily and the field was very wet, ruKa
fixed on a little pig (Yuri) that was diving into the mud. Immediately
the love between the two arose. 

The days passed and they were more and more united, ruKa
had regained the desire to live and already saw life as something dignified and precious.

Then one day, humans, vegan beings so far, are left without
natural catastrophe, and decide to become omnivorous, because of their
what they kidnap, using somniferous darts, to the piara of ruKa and Yuri, taking them to a
slaughterhouse.

ruKa, after waking up in the middle of the night, realizes that he is in the slaughterhouse, and of
suddenly takes out the survival instinct he never had before, which he will use to
trying to free Yuri from the hands of human killers.

All the music is also composed and produced by fatalerror.
